name: MultiColored (itch)
description:
What is the essence of the game?
You need to constantly change the color of the cube, your character, depending on what color the wall is moving towards you. If the color matches, then you will calmly pass through it and continue the game, and if the color does not match, then you will have to accept defeat. You will also have bonuses that will help you achieve the highest score. They can be purchased for coins, you get them by passing the walls, good luck!
Control
W to change the color
Space bar to start the game and restart it if you lose
